feed.title: Gravity Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.9.2
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.9.2

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.9.2

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.9.2

What's Changed

  • Bump @rollup/plugin-node-resolve from 15.2.3 to 15.2.4 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1202
  • Bump rollup from 4.22.0 to 4.22.4 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1201
  • Bump esbuild from 0.23.1 to 0.24.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1200
  • Bump eslint from 9.10.0 to 9.11.0 in /web in the eslint group by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1198
  • Bump @rollup/plugin-typescript from 11.1.6 to 12.1.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1199
  • Patternfly v6 by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1179
  • Bump @patternfly/patternfly from 6.0.0-prerelease.3 to 6.0.0-prerelease.13 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1203
  • Bump @rollup/plugin-node-resolve from 15.2.4 to 15.3.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1206
  • Bump the eslint group in /web with 3 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1204
  • Bump @rollup/plugin-commonjs from 26.0.1 to 28.0.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1205
  • Bump github.com/minio/minio-go/v7 from 7.0.76 to 7.0.77 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1207
  • Bump rapidoc from 9.3.6 to 9.3.7 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1211
  • Bump docker/build-push-action from 6.7.0 to 6.8.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1209
  • Bump rollup from 4.22.4 to 4.22.5 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1210
  • Bump the eslint group in /web with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1213
  • Bump docker/build-push-action from 6.8.0 to 6.9.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1212
  • Bump globals from 15.9.0 to 15.10.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1216
  • Bump rollup from 4.22.5 to 4.23.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1215
  • Bump @patternfly/patternfly from 6.0.0-prerelease.13 to 6.0.0-prerelease.15 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1214
  • Bump rollup from 4.23.0 to 4.24.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1217
  • Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.29.0 to 0.30.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1222
  • Bump github.com/swaggest/rest from 0.2.66 to 0.2.67 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1219
  • Bump eslint from 9.11.1 to 9.12.0 in /web in the eslint group by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1218
  • Bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.27.0 to 0.28.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1220
  • Bump lit from 3.2.0 to 3.2.1 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1224
  • Bump the eslint group in /web with 3 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1223
  • Bump globals from 15.10.0 to 15.11.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1225
  • Bump cookie and swagger-client in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1226
  • Bump cookie and swagger-client in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1227
  • Bump github.com/prometheus-community/pro-bing from 0.3.0 to 0.4.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1237
  • Bump github.com/minio/minio-go/v7 from 7.0.77 to 7.0.78 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1238
  • Bump globals from 15.9.0 to 15.11.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1235
  • Bump @rollup/plugin-node-resolve from 15.2.4 to 15.3.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1233
  • Bump lit from 3.2.0 to 3.2.1 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1232
  • Bump @rollup/plugin-commonjs from 26.0.1 to 28.0.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1230
  • Bump the eslint group in /web with 4 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1228
  • Bump rapidoc from 9.3.6 to 9.3.8 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1231
  • Bump yaml from 2.5.1 to 2.6.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1234
  • Bump rollup from 4.22.4 to 4.24.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1229
  • Bump github.com/getsentry/sentry-go from 0.29.0 to 0.29.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1241
  • Bump the eslint group in /web with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1240
  • Bump github.com/prometheus/client_golang from 1.20.4 to 1.20.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1245
  • Bump chart.js from 4.4.4 to 4.4.5 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1244
  • Bump @rollup/plugin-typescript from 12.1.0 to 12.1.1 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1243
  • Bump @rollup/plugin-commonjs from 28.0.0 to 28.0.1 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1242
  • Bump library/node from 22.9 to 23.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1246

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.9.1...v0.9.2

Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.13.4
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.13.4

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.13.4

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.13.4

What's Changed

  • Bump github.com/Netflix/go-env from 0.1.1 to 0.1.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1265
  • Bump chart.js from 4.4.5 to 4.4.6 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1264
  • Bump the eslint group in /web with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1263
  • Bump rollup from 4.24.2 to 4.24.3 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1268
  • Bump the eslint group in /web with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1267
  • Bump github.com/minio/minio-go/v7 from 7.0.79 to 7.0.80 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1266
  • Initial allowlist support by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1271

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.13.3...v0.13.4

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.14.0
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.14.0

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.14.0

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.14.0

What's Changed

  • fix blocky allowlists, add tests by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1272
  • dns: better config by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1273

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.13.4...v0.14.0
